item.title: Extending the Monitoring Stack
item.description: Extending the Monitoring Stack This document provides instructions to extend the Shoot cluster monitoring stack by integrating new scrape targets, alerts and dashboards. Please ensure that you have understood the basic principles of Prometheus and its ecosystem before you continue. :bangbang: The purpose of the monitoring stack is to observe the behaviour of the control plane and the system components deployed by Gardener onto the worker nodes. Monitoring of custom workloads running in the cluster is out of scope.
